This screen lists all of the songs for whichever show was selected. You have a few options with what you can do here... 
\ 
\ If you want to just play a song, click on it. It will start playing in the background. You can get to the "now playing" screen by going to the status bar at the top of your phone screen, or by clicking on the menu button and selecting "now playing." The entire show will be queued to play. 
\ 
\ If you want to download a song, long-press on the song, and you will have the option to do so. You can even choose to download the entire show! If a show is downloaded, a star will appear next to it, and it will play from your phone (instead of from the Internet) if you click on it. You can also play it by going to "Downloaded Songs" from the home screen.

Active Downloads shows you the status of songs that you have (or are) downloading in this Vibe Vault session. \n\ \n\ Shows Downloaded gives you a list of shows from which you\'ve downloaded songs. Click a show to see what songs you\'ve downloaded from it. Click a song to start playing it immediately, or long-press on a song to add it to the now playing list.
Use the playback controls at the top of the screen to manage your now playing list. Long-press on a song to remove it.
A list of recently viewed shows. Click one to open it up.
